snippet: Air travel in Nigeria can be a routine experience, but one that exists on the edge of catastrophe, as a plane crash last week in Lagos underscored.
abstract: Lagos Journal; deadly plane crash in Lagos, Nigeria, underscores the precariousness of air travel in the country; flights are regularly plagued by long delays, shoddy maintenance, disorganized staff and corrupt inspections.
lead_paragraph: Air travel in Nigeria can be a routine experience, but one that exists on the edge of catastrophe, as a plane crash last week in Lagos underscored.

headline.main: After a Crash, New Anxiety for Travelers in Nigeria
headline.print_headline: After a Crash, New Anxiety for Travelers in Nigeria
